data.title: 10 Famous Couples Who Also Make A Perfect On-Screen Pair
data.meta_description: These are our favourite celebrity couples. From creating a storm on the internet to setting the red carpet on fire, when they step out together, magic is bound to happen.
data.text:
These power couples never leave a chance to give us #RelationshipGoals.

1. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Abhishek Bachchan - This couple Bollywood couple created a storm in the country when they announced their wedding. Abhishek and Aishwarya got married in 2007 and the lovely pair is still giving us couple goals after more than a decade of their marriage. They have starred in movies like Umrao Jaan and Guru together.

Aishwarya Rai Bachchan & Abhishek BachchanImage courtesy: Instagram

2. Kareena Kapoor Khan and Saif Ali Khan – When one of the most loved actresses of India married a nawab-cum-Bollywood heartthrob, magic was created. The love story they shared was as dramatic and beautiful as their movies. Kareena and Saif started dating during the shooting of Kurbaan in 2009 and tied the knot in October 2012.

Kareena Kapoor Khan & Saif Ali KhanImage courtesy: Pinterest

3. Sarah Michelle Gellar and Freddie Prinze Jr. - This 90s couple has been together for two decades. Making us nostalgic every time we see them, their relationship is what dreams are made of. They got married in 2002 after they started dating in 1997 during their movie I Know What You Did Last Summer.

Sarah Michelle & Freddie Prinze Jr.Image Coutesy: Pinterest

4. Jaya Bachchan and Amitabh Bachchan – Marrying the most famous actor of Bollywood has its own ups and downs. In case of Jaya Bachchan and Amitabh Bachchan, they have managed to stay together despite the media claiming otherwise. They got to know each other when Jaya and Amitabh met on the sets of Guddi.

Jaya Bachchan & Amitabh BachchanImage courtesy: Pinterest

5. Goldie Hawn and Kurt Russell – This pair might not have gotten married but their relationship (which has been going on from the past three decades) has taught us a lot about rebellious love. Goldie met Kurt on sets of The One and Only in 1968 almost a decade before they started dating.

Goldie Hawk & Kurt RussellImage courtesy: Pinterest

6. Ryan Reynolds and Blake Lively – We don’t need to tell you about this couple. Blake and Ryan clearly make the most celebrated and loved celebrity pair across the globe. Ryan’s mischievous yet extremely adorable tweets and Instagram posts make us all chuckle in awe. Lively tied the knot with Ryan Reynolds in 2012.

Ryan Reynolds & Blake LivelyImage courtesy: Instagram

7. Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth – Miley and Liam met on the sets of The Last Song in June 2009 and started their rollercoaster relationship. With countless ups and downs and speculations they are still together and drowned in love. After a major break-up in 2013, they reunited in 2016.

Miley Cyrus & Liam HemsworthImage courtesy: Pinterest

9. Ryan Gosling and Eva Mendes - After first meeting on the set of The Place Beyond the Pines, Ryan and Eva started their ‘oh-so-adorable’ relationship. These two have been dating since 2011 and have managed to keep their relationship as private as they can.

Ryan Gosling & Eva MendesImage courtesy: Pinterest

These were our favourite celebrity couples. From creating a storm on the internet to setting the red carpet on fire, when they step out together, magic is bound to happen.
